content.html: The top 10 predictors of successful engineering careers. I've helped hire 100s of engineers in my 12+ year career. I've managed and steered the careers of multiple engineering teams. Some of these may surprise you, but I am confident they predict career success in our industry.
content.value:
The top 10 predictors of successful engineering careers.

I've helped hire 100s of engineers in my 12+ year career. I've managed and steered the careers of multiple engineering teams.

Some of these may surprise you, but I am confident they predict career success in our industry.
